title: Sun Salutations
description: Practice your sun salutations with Miriam.

title: Mini Meditation
description: Healthy in body and mind. Find a quiet place for a 10-minute breathing meditation.

title: Boat pose
description: Balance on your butt with shoulders back and feet off the floor. Straighten your legs or rotate your torso for a challenge!

title: Sit-ups
description: Form is key! Keep your lower back down close to the floor.

title: Walk Around the Block
description: Head outside for some fresh air, even if it's raining!
